input_text:
Job Title: VP Engineering - Series B FinTech - hybrid onsite NY

Location: New York, NY

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Dice is the leading career destination for tech experts at every stage of their careers. Our client, Jobot, is seeking the following. Apply via Dice today!

VP Engineering for a leading Series B FinTech

This Jobot Job is hosted by: Jesse Gray

Are you a fit? Easy Apply now by clicking the "Apply Now" button and sending us your resume.

Salary: $275,000 - $300,000 per year

A bit about us:

We are a Series B funded AI FinTech that operate in the market data space. Our client manage vast amounts of data and go far beyond generating investment insights using some of the most advanced AI techniques and technologies

Why join us?

You will be pivotal in the growth and scale of the US presence for this rapidly growing, award winning FinTech. You will lead technical direction, hiring and report directly to the board.

Job Details

Job Details:

We are a rapidly growing FinTech company, currently in our Series B funding round, seeking an experienced and dynamic VP of Engineering to join our team. This is a full-time, permanent position with a hybrid work model based in New York. We are at the cutting edge of the technology industry, using advanced AI, deep machine learning, and natural language processing to revolutionize the financial sector.

Responsibilities:

As the VP of Engineering, you will be expected to:

 Lead, manage and scale our engineering team, fostering a culture of innovation and excellence. Develop and implement strategic plans for technological development, aligning with the company's business goals. Oversee the design, development, and deployment of our cutting-edge FinTech solutions. Work closely with other executives to identify opportunities for technological advancements. Ensure the efficiency, reliability, and scalability of our systems and software. Stay updated with the latest industry trends and advancements in AI, machine learning, and NLP. Collaborate with the product team to ensure seamless integration of new features and improvements. Establish and implement training programs for the engineering team. Ensure compliance with industry standards and regulations. Manage and optimize resources, including budgeting and timelines, to ensure project delivery.

Qualifications:

The ideal candidate will possess the following qualifications:

 A minimum of 5 years of experience in a similar role (VP of Engineering or Director of Engineering). Proven experience in the technology industry, ideally within the FinTech sector. Strong technical proficiency, particularly in Golang, TypeScript, and React. Deep understanding of machine learning, deep machine learning, artificial intelligence, and natural language processing. Experience in leading and managing a diverse team of engineers. A degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field is preferred.

This is an exciting opportunity to join a dynamic and innovative company at the forefront of the FinTech industry. If you have a passion for technology and a drive to lead a team towards success, we would love to hear from you.

Interested in hearing more? Easy Apply now by clicking the "Apply Now" button. VP Engineering - Series B FinTech - hybrid onsite NY

Experience Level (if available): Executive
